name: Fathr: Explain tumblr to your dad simulator 2017
name_original: Fathr: Explain tumblr to your dad simulator 2017
description:
fathr: Explain tumblr to your dad simulator 2017!

Made for the Cool Jams Inc. game jam! The premise? Explain tumblr to your Dad! Good luck!

Possibly NSFW content (just like real tumblr). Post-jam version with some fixes available here.

Created by:

Jafar Abdulrasoul - programming
